articles.title: People Are Sharing The Biggest Reasons They Don't Want Kids, And Every Single One Is Valid
articles.description: "Housing and cost of living are through the roof. Having another mouth to feed would put us further into poverty and wouldn’t be fair for the kid."
articles.content:
u/DogsReadingBooks
"I quite like kids. I am very maternal toward my nephews. But being a parent would make me an anxious, high-strung, overworked mess. The stress of it gives me chills. I'd be emoti… [+400 chars]
